ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Data_Error_Fixed__c, ISCHANGED(Data_Error_Fixed__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Booking__r.Status__c,'Booking Confirmed')), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator',$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not perform Data Error fixed without the Booking Confirmed
